title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant: A Timeless Elegance for Every Bride (Nalla Pusala Thali)
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with brilliant-cut Diamonds; VVS Clarity
E-F Color. Exquisitely crafted with meticulous Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
features: Features a V-shaped design with multiple rows of pave-set diamonds. Openwork design allows maximum light to enhance the sparkle of each diamond. A contemporary take on a traditional mangalsutra pendant, blending modern aesthetics with cultural significance.
colors: Yellow Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: and modern festive occasions. A symbol of love and commitment suitable for both traditional and contemporary settings. Ideal for the modern Telugu bride.
description: This diamond mangalsutra pendant is a symbol of eternal love and commitment. The exquisite diamond setting showcases exceptional craftsmanship, while the V-shaped design adds a touch of modern elegance. It's a versatile piece that can be worn every day, allowing you to carry the essence of tradition with a contemporary flair.
